remarks: Two equivalent expressions for double restricted existential uniqueness, analogous to ~ 2eu7 .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jul-2017.)
statement:
2reu7 $p |- ( ( E! x e. A E. y e. B ph /\ E! y e. B E. x e. A ph ) <-> E! x e. A E! y e. B ( E. x e. A ph /\ E. y e. B ph ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
